CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 16,17 Up to now , PCEs of the polymer solar cells incorporating BT / BO derivatives have reached 6-7 % , and hole mobilities of OFETs based on BT - containing polymers have been up to 1 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 after systematic optimization.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PCEs of the polymer solar cells incorporating BT / BO derivatives |
| BT - containing polymers |
| OFETs based on BT - containing polymers |

Note: I assumed that "BT" and "BO" are abbreviations for certain material names. If they are not, please let me know and I will make the necessary adjustments.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| BT / BO derivatives |
| BT - containing polymers |

Note: I assumed that "BT" and "BO" are abbreviations for certain material names. If they are not, please let me know and I will make the necessary adjustments.

I have removed "PCEs of the polymer solar cells incorporating BT / BO derivatives" and "OFETs based on BT - containing polymers" as they are not clearly referring to material names, but rather to the applications or properties of those materials.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 16,17 Up to now , PCEs of the polymer solar cells incorporating BT / BO derivatives have reached 6-7 % , and hole mobilities of OFETs based on BT - containing polymers have been up to 1 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 after systematic optimization.

Let's think step by step.

Here are the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph presented as a Markdown table:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PCEs |
| hole mobilities |

Explanation:

* PCEs: Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiencies
* hole mobilities: A property that describes how easily holes can move through a material.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

After reviewing the paragraph, I have determined that there is only one clear "Material Property" entity in the text. Here it is presented as a Markdown table:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| hole mobilities |

Explanation:

* Hole mobilities: A property that describes how easily holes can move through a material.

The other entity, PCEs (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiencies), is not a material property, but rather a measure of the performance of a solar cell.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 16,17 Up to now , PCEs of the polymer solar cells incorporating BT / BO derivatives have reached 6-7 % , and hole mobilities of OFETs based on BT - containing polymers have been up to 1 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 after systematic optimization.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 6-7 % |
| 1 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 |

The two "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are "6-7 %" and "1 cm^2 V -1 s^-1". These entities represent specific values of the power conversion efficiency (PCE) of polymer solar cells and the hole mobility of organic field-effect transistors (OFETs), respectively.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 6-7 % |
| 1 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 |

After re-evaluating the paragraph, the two entities "6-7 %" and "1 cm^2 V -1 s^-1" still clearly refer to the values of material properties, namely the power conversion efficiency (PCE) of polymer solar cells and the hole mobility of organic field-effect transistors (OFETs), respectively. Therefore, these are the valid entities to be presented as a Markdown table.
